news.title: Buffett says Berkshire has the best odds of any company for lasting a century as he hands over reins
news.summary: Berkshire has "a better chance I think of being here 100 years from now than any company I can think of," Buffett says.

news.title: Will he stay or will he go? Powell is not saying whether he'll stay on Fed board when chair term ends
news.summary: Fed Chair Jay Powell has so far skirted the question of whether he'll stay on with the Fed when his term ends this year. He has said he's not sure if he wants to stay on.

news.title: Behind the mesh curtain: Why airline class wars will intensify in 2026
news.summary: Airlines are adding lounges, new first-class cabins and other perks for customers willing to spend more to fly. Airlines are continuing their focus on premium travelers.

news.title: Trump says U.S. will intervene if Iran 'violently kills' protestors
news.summary: Protests erupted last week over the government's handling of a sharp fall in the nation's currency and soaring prices. Protests erupt over government's Handling of a Sharp Fall in the Nation's Currency and soaring Prices.

news.title: Bernie Sanders and Ron DeSantis speak out against data center boom. It's a bad sign for AI industry
news.summary: Sen. Bernie Sanders has called for a data center moratoriu. Gov. Ron DeSantis has pushed back on the AI industry in Florida.

news.title: ‘He has become hostile’: My mom is in her 80s and has dementia. My brother is blocking access.
news.summary: “Can someone who has not been found legally incompetent, but who has a history of delusions, make decisions regarding property?” he asks.

news.title: These overlooked indicators say tech stocks may not lead the market in 2026

news.title: China’s BYD just raised the bar on EV sales. Tesla may struggle to catch up.
news.summary: China EV maker BYD has published preliminary sales data for 2025. The data could put it ahead of Tesla when it comes to global sales.
